I also have to amdit I havent used the box yet but I am interested in doing=
 so. I had a look on the net to purchase one. I have also been thinking of =
way of modifying my own as you guys give pretty good tips on here about thi=
s.

So your recordings dont change from when they are first made frank?


R=
egards

Eamonn

From: eamonn mgherbi <e=

Sent: Friday, 5 June,=
 2009 16:52:56
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: [RTSC] a copy of my final e-mail =
to Frank sumption I will go no further!





Wow first of all dont swear on=
 here and wind your neck in!

Now I have to admit I didnt mean you I was ta=
lking about Chris moon but hell im at work and im trying to do 2 things at =
once.

I have been following this group for a year and from the message i w=
rote this is the first time I got a reply. Now Frank I think you work is qu=
ality and I definately want to learn more about your work and what you do. =
and if you could advise me of where I can see a profile of yourself that wo=
uld be great. but dont start with the abusive crap towards me.

Lets keep i=
t clean. Again I was talking about Moon. not you Frank, iv read my message =
over and i definately worded it wrong. Im just not a big fan of Chris Moon.=


And the religious crap thing also wind your neck in about that, that was =
a pretty crappy thing first of all im not religious it just causes war. sec=
ond of all I want to know more about your work.



________________________=
________
From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com>
To: EVP-ITC@yaho=
ogroups .com
Sent: Friday, 5 June, 2009 16:25:28
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re:=
 [RTSC] a copy of my final e-mail to Frank sumption I will go no further!

=

=A0Arrogant!? Lets see,=A0I don't do shows, I'm not on podcast every frigg=
in' day proclaiming my expertness, I don't charge money-for anything, I sha=
re all information and schematics, and I do not kiss anyone's ass, guess th=
at must be so egotistical of me.=A0 Arrogant!?, who is=A0the f--- is the du=
ffus out there with the high priest mentality?=A0 The really sad part is tr=
he brain dead dorks that follow these clowns. Haliday proclaimed himself bo=
x expert extraordinaire, and there's those sorry twits that eat up everywor=
d. There are no box/paranormal experts, no one knows how this shit works. G=
o to church if you want a religious experience!

=A0Anyway, there is one ad=
vantage to using tape, the entities seem capable of changing the messages a=
s needed. I can use the same recording over an over, and I swear, I get mea=
ningful, having to do with the moment on every listening. Brain matrixing--=
perhaps- -or does it really change? I can't tell. 

=A0Frank-S



=A0
On Fr=
i, Jun 5, 2009 at 3:58 AM, eamonn mgherbi <eamonnmgherbi@ yahoo.co. uk> wro=
te:




Hi All

I have to admit that I share the same opinion as Bruce. I d=
ont what everyones take is on this but I felt that some of moon and even Fr=
anks attitude was slightly arrogant. I am a researcher in the UK using old =
reel to reel methods and obtaining excellent results. I lost some family an=
d some close friends=A05 yeara ago=A0and suddenly it dawned on me...what is=
 life all about. I went on to research every evp pioneer i could, listen to=
 hours/days of recordings and it changed my outlook on life. tears were tur=
ned to smiles and then I realised what all this research is for. it was a b=
ig step for me spiritually. 

I dont know if there is anyone else on here u=
sing old fashioned methods but if anybody would like to hear recordings ple=
ase ask. I am using a reel to reel sony "Hi frequency" recorder and trying =
various types of tones, backgrounds e.t.c.

Good luck to everyone with thei=
r research, you are right we are changing history we are discovering new th=
ings. if it wasnt for individuals such as raudive, jurghenson to name a few=
, maybe we wouldnt have discovered this. it takes a brave individual to tac=
kle an arrogant human race blunted with science.

Kind Regards

The quiet o=
ne :-)

Time Offers: Save big on popular laptops at Dell
Sorry to hear this Bruce, =
I=A0sure hope things get better, =A0I had no idea there were so many proble=
ms when I joined all these lists, =A0I think you are all great people, you =
folks together are making history don't you all realize this?=A0 There are =
so many people out there that have never heard of this type of communicatio=
n, thousands out there!=A0 My friend just lost her mother a couple of weeks=
 ago, when I told her about the work you all are doing, tears were replaced=
 with a smile, she is looking forward to hearing from her mom now too.=A0 S=
top trying to hurt each other, it's not worth it, life is too short for thi=
s stuff.=A0 You are all great people, May God Bless You All=A0~ And He Alre=
ady Has,
sf

In a message dated 6/4/2009 2:27:06 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time=
, balllan94@yahoo. com writes:



guys,

Sorry to burden you with this nons=
ense but this group and the RTSC group are my only venues to respond to pos=
ts on other groups and have my account heard, I hope you do not mind to muc=
h.

Here is a copy of my final personal e-mail to Frank Sumption which by t=
he way is meant for him but he see's fit to post them publicly in an attemp=
t to discredit me.

I want you to read it first hand so there are no chance=
 of it being altered before it is posted else where.

I will not address Fr=
ank again
------------ --------- --------- --------- --------- --------- -
=

Frank,

This is getting ridiculous now, you should stop writing these post=
s, all you are doing is making yourself look ridiculous.

I have offered ma=
ny times to make my raw recordings available for review by anyone who wants=
 them. I have made the same challenge to your friend moon who we all know i=
s behind this tirade he has time and again refused or ignored the request f=
or any type of audio file
to be publicly posted for revue and continues to =
take advantage of innocent unsuspecting people with his con game and chargi=
ng large amounts of money for sessions where he fabricates and makes up con=
tent as he goes along.

I was the only one to confront him in public and ex=
pose him for the fake he is and this is his feeble attempt at retaliation. =
I and other researchers like me have brought this research light years from=
 where it was when you and I first met, moon just continues to use it to ri=
p people off and has not contributed a thing to the research of ghost box c=
ommunication beside lining his own pockets. 

Just the fact that he has you=
 doing his dirty work shows the type of guy he is. I can remember a time wh=
en you publicly came out against any type of money making using your boxes =
and even refused moon when he wanted to manufacture and sell them for large=
 profits yet now you condone his robbery of innocent unaware people and act=
ually act foolish on his behest.

Frank you are better than this, just conc=
entrate on developing a better box and forget about moon and his tricks and=
 lies, he is finished in the paranormal and he knows it, everyone is wise t=
o his game and he is practically an outcast.

Frank you are hitching you wa=
gon to a dead horse. Get away from these bad influences before they ruin yo=
ur reputation as well.

We have had this moon discussion in the past and on=
ce he has exhausted his need for you he will screw you again like he has do=
ne so many times before.

Frank, I like and respect you and I hope you will=
 consider what I have said in this e-mail and I sincerely hope you post thi=
s one on the evp-itc group. I will be posting it on my group and others I b=
elong to.

Your former friend
Bruce
